text: @TheDesKelly Is he a nob, yes! But China does need to be held accountable at some point! An this journalist couldn’t wait to play the race card! Plus, did her getting angry all of sudden protect her from covid 🤷‍♂️ *removes mask 😷 #COVID19 #Trump #journalism
